description: Data Transfer Object (DTO) class for creating or updating a ToDo item, including fields for title, description, completion status, and due date.

classes.name: ToDoRequest
classes.description: A DTO class encapsulating data for creating or updating a ToDo item with validation annotations.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the to-do item.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the to-do item.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Returns the description of the to-do item.

methods.name: setDescription
methods.description: Sets the description of the to-do item.

methods.name: getCompleted
methods.description: Returns whether the to-do item is completed.

methods.name: setCompleted
methods.description: Sets the completion status of the to-do item.

methods.name: getDueDate
methods.description: Returns the due date of the to-do item.

methods.name: setDueDate
methods.description: Sets the due date of the to-do item.
